Operation.label: Move everying to the vehicle tab
Operation.tooltip: Moves all furniture added by RimThunder and its modules into the vehicle tab added by Vehicle Framework.

li.xpath: //ThingDef[(@ParentName="BuildingBase" or @ParentName="BenchBase" or @ParentName="FurnitureBase" or @ParentName="StorageShelfBase") and (starts-with(defName, "RT_") or starts-with(defName, "RTC_"))]/designationCategory[not(text()="VF_Vehicles")]/text()
